text: @SecPompeo @StateDept BEWARE SENIOR CITIZENS! GOP and Lbertarians can’t kill Medicare and Social Security. Their Plan-B is to continue downplaying and bungling COVID-19 pandemic so that the people that use Medicare and Social Security are killed. EVICT TRUMP & GOP FROM D.C.!
